arts.ttl: St. Pauli end home goal drought in convincing win over Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: St. Pauli players celebrate their long-awaited home goal, setting the tone for a memorable victory against Holstein Kiel. Both teams entered the match seeking to improve their positions in the table, with St. Pauli particularly eager to break their home goal drought and climb out of the relegation zone.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Holstein Kiel preview: Two promoted sides lock horns
arts.sum: Two newly-promoted sides will face off when St. Pauli welcome Holstein Kiel to Millerntor-Stadion for Fridayâ€™s Bundesliga contest.
After European games for some German clubs in midweek, it is a return to Bundesliga action this weekend with Alex Jack taking us through all nine games.
